Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera!
Reviews.Author: Mike Coleman "Mike C."
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera just before a trip to Ireland so I could take better quality pictures of the trip.  I was not disappointed.  Being new to a digital SLR, I was worried that I would not be familiar enough with the camera to get good pictures but that was not an issue.  Great pictures of a great trip.  I also bought the 55-300mm VR Lens along with it and that is a fantastic addtion to an already great set-up.  I highly recommend both items.

Reviews.Title: Great!!! I love it
Reviews.Author: Diana Burgos C "dibu"
Reviews.Content: This two products together make the perfect combination to start with the pothography adventure. It is an incredible combination, Im specialy happy with the lenses!!!I recommend this to all th  people who like photography and experience or either could be usefull for beginner!!!

ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3100 Digital SLR Camera Kit w/ AF-S DX 18-55mm VR & Nikon AF-S DX 55-300mm VR Zoom Lens
